Begini Kronologi Kecelakaan Ojol di Mampang Versi Sopir Bus TransJ
03 Nov 2019, 18:12 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - Pengemudi bus TransJakarta, Butu, menceritakan kronologi kecelakaan dengan pengemudi ojek online (ojol) di Mampang, Jakarta Selatan. Dia menyebut ojol itu menerobos lampu merah sehingga terjadi tabrakan itu.
Butu mengatakan posisi dia berada dari arah Ragunan, Jakarta Selatan yang menuju ke arah Kuningan. Saat itu posisi lampu lalu lintas berwarna hijau, namun tiba-tiba ada motor yang menerobos busway itu.
"Saya kan dari Lebak Bulus arah Senen, ini posisi di lampu merah Duren Tiga ya. Posisi jalur busway sudah hijau, tiba-tiba motor dari sebelah kiri motong, akhirnya kejadianlah. Yang kena bumper (bus)," kata Butu saat ditemui di lokasi kejadian di Mampang, Jakarta Selatan, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Butu mengatakan ada 2 penumpang di motor itu. Korban langsung dirujuk ke rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan perawatan.
"(Korban) sedang dibawa ke RS. Pengemudinya aja luka di kepala, penumpangnya nggak ada luka, mungkin kaget kena benturan," jelasnya.
Sementara itu, petugas Dishub yang berada di lokasi, Syamsul Arifin, menyebut kejadian itu terjadi sekitar pukul 17.10 WIB. Ia mengatakan penumpang ojol merupakan anak sekolah dasar (SD), namun anak itu tak dibawa ke rumah sakit yang sama dengan driver ojol.
"Driver dibawa ke RS JMC, kalau penumpang ke orang tuanya," kata Syamsul.

Here's the Ojol Accident Chronology in Mampang TransJ Bus Driver Version
Nov 03 2019, 18:12 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - TransJakarta bus driver, Butu, tells the chronology of the accident with an online motorcycle taxi driver (ojol) in Mampang, South Jakarta. He said the ojol ran a red light so that the collision occurred.
Butu said that his position was in the direction of Ragunan, South Jakarta, which was heading towards Kuningan. At that time the position of the traffic lights was green, but suddenly a motorbike broke through the busway.
"I'm from Lebak Bulus in the direction of Senen, this is the position at the Duren Tiga red light. The position of the busway lane is green, suddenly the motorbike from the left side is cut off, finally it happened. The one that hit the bumper (bus)," said Butu when met at the location the incident in Mampang, South Jakarta, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Butu said there were 2 passengers on the motorbike. The victim was immediately referred to the nearest hospital for treatment.
"(The victim) is being taken to the hospital. The driver just has a head wound, there are no injuries to the passengers, maybe shocked because of the collision," he explained.
Meanwhile, Dishub official at the location, Syamsul Arifin, said the incident occurred at around 17:10 WIB. He said ojol passengers were elementary school children, but the child was not taken to the same hospital as the ojol driver.
"Drivers are taken to JMC Hospital, if the passengers go to their parents," said Syamsul.
